text.headline: The Machine Beneath the Waves
text.text: It began with a dive. A glint of bronze in the deep. My name is Elias, and this is the story of what I found below the surface.

text.headline: The First Glimmer
text.text: It was just a glint at first. Among broken statues and pottery, something different. Something... alive.

text.headline: More Than a Statue
text.text: I thought it was part of a helm or instrument. But as I brushed away the sand, the gears stared back.

text.headline: The Inscriptions
text.text: Letters. Ancient Greek. Not decoration—these were instructions. Or warnings.

text.headline: A Clockwork Cosmos
text.text: It spun. Slowly. Silently. Like it remembered the sky. A machine that knew time.

text.headline: The Realization
text.text: This wasn’t just bronze. It was a mind. A memory. A machine for the universe. And it found me.
